headline: Broadcom (AVGO) Surged Following the News of $10 Billion Booking Order
summary: Sands Capital, an investment management company, released its “Sands Capital Select Growth Strategy” Q3 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. U.S. large-cap growth equities continued to recover from a sharp sell-off in early April. Strong corporate earnings, investor enthusiasm around artificial intelligence (AI), and growing expectations for Federal Reserve […]

headline: Buffett's Bet on Google Just Lit a Fire Under Broadcom's Stock
summary: A surprise rally in Alphabet could be reshuffling the AI leaderboard--and Broadcom is suddenly sprinting to the front.

headline: Asian shares rise, taking their cue from Wall Street's winning streak
summary: Asian shares rose on Thursday, taking their cue from Wall Street, where a winning streak extended to a fourth straight day.  The future for S&P 500 and that for the Dow Jones Industrial Average were nearly unchanged.  Japan’s Nikkei 225 added 1.2% to 50,167.10 as investors bet that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates at its Dec. 10 meeting.

headline: Dan Ives Once Again Rejects AI Bubble Fears, Calls Microsoft A 'Table-Pounder' Pick And Highlights Google's AI Tailwinds As Key Evidence
summary: On Tuesday, Wedbush analyst Dan Ives reiterated that the AI market is far from a bubble and still in the early stages of growth. AI Boom Far From Over, Wedbush Analyst Says "This is just the start," Ives said on CNBC's Closing Bell Overtime, while ...
